игра хорошая
одна из немногих игр , которая вывалилась между булок валве и оставила прекрасное впечатление
из плюсов это конечно головоломки, если вы животное , пришедшее из кс или пабга то игра явно не для вас.
графика не бесит, все плавно и для людей
из минусов эта героиня, за которую вы играете, не всегда залетает в порталы, а приземляется рядом - это не так часто случается, но бесит
еще кооператив какой - то ебанутый, у вас включен микрофон автоматом и вы вынуждены говорить с незнакомым челом, а еще у некоторых людей микрофоны шипят пердят и тп и заглушить это нельзя, потому что кооперативный режим предусматривает что вы будете говорить с человеком
а еще песенка в конце просто чума - это не ваши фейсы, монеточки, икстасионы и прочее говно
игра 9 из 10 (кооператив немного странный но играбельный)

玩了第二代,通關後立馬去買第一代再玩,非常棒的遊戲

1에 이어 2를 단숨에 몰아서 했다.
훨씬 더 커진 볼륨과 스토리에 정말 만족스러웠다.

다만 하면서도 이제 3가 없어서 더이상 포탈게임을 할수 없다는게 슬퍼졌다.
마지막에 분명 음악이 나올걸 알았지만 알면서도 눈물이 났다 ㅠㅠ.

이런 좋은게임을 여름할인을 통해 알수있어서 정말 행운이다.
1,2에 나왔던 노래들은 계속 듣게될거같다.

Portal 2 is an amazing follow up to the original. It’s campaign does focus more on the lore and characters, but that isn’t a bad thing in my opinion. There is plenty of testing to be done. Between the cleverly designed co-op or the incredible maps the hammer community creates you shouldn’t run out of anything to do anytime soon. 

Well worth the price and all the hours of fun it has given me on Steam.

[b]10/10[/b] This game has improved on everything the original Portal had to offer. The only complaint I had about the original was that it was too short, the sequel totally fixes that problem with a satisfyingly long story. This game is super fun and challenging. I really enjoyed the story and gameplay. I love that you can make your own levels and I am very happy about the cooperative mode. I highly recommend this game and hope you try it out
Llllalalala

Como Portal salió tan bien y tuvo gran acogida, hicieron un juego entero de este tema con más variaciones y nuevos tipos de puzzles. También incluyeron el juego cooperativo.

Si te gustó Portal, esta segunda parte es obligatoria.

Si no sabes lo que es Portal, el concepto básico es el siguiente:
- Juego en primera persona
- Pistola de portales, que hace portales de entrada y salida, y tu pasas por ellos.
- Pantallas con una entrada y te lo tienes que currar para llegar a la salida. Nota: utiliza tu pistola de portales.

Pese a los miles de años que tiene el juego, en 2018 y con Win10 a 4K funciona bien. También es compatible con mando 100%, así que todo es correcto en ese aspecto.
Muy entretenido
For me this game is one of the greatest games ever made.I highly recommend it!

Portal and Portal 2 are both a blast. At this price, you can't go wrong. Pick them both up!

Both games are challenging, rewarding, fun, and not too stressful. They're a great way to wind down and yet still be stimulated. Portal 2, in particular, comes with a solid story line, co-op components, and way more hours of gameplay than most single-player or puzzle genre games.

This is a must-have for anyone on Steam. Grab it!
eu comprei esse jogo na promoção e foi um dos melhores jogos que eu comprei. Eu já tinha terminado esse jogo na conta de um amigo e ainda tenho umas dez horas de inovação com os mapas da comunidade

Best game i played in a while.

Challenging puzzles, an interesting story and great characters. What's not to like about this game? The only thing that [i] came close [/i] to being a con was the frustration you get if you feel stuck on some level. But even that actually turns out to be a pro when you manage to figure it out. Such a rewarding moment! 
When playing the first game I ran out of patience a few times and ended up looking up some solutions online. It's not a fun thing to do. I remembered this while playing Portal 2 and decided not to look up any solutions no matter what. Some levels took me a bit longer to figure out. But I did it. I solved them all on my own! That made me realize I was wrong when doubting myself when playing the first game. Could have solved them too myself as I've heard Portal 2 is even harder (and honestly I can see why you'd say so). 
So besides being a great experience Portal 2 ended up seriously building up my formerly flimsy confidence in my problem solving abilities. That's something I'll definitely benefit from when concidering what kind of job I'll most likely end up having (and it'll help with getting formal qualifications too before that). 
In summary Portal 2 is as a game that not only is such a great experience that I almost wish I could wipe out my memory of playing it just to experience it as all new again but also helped me with my confidence. Absolutely one of my favourite games. If you like a good story, good characters and good puzzles, you're definitely missing out if you don't try out this game. I give Portal 2 a strong recommendation!

ótimo jogo de puzzle

Portal 2, como sua antecessora, é um jogo de Puzzle e Aventura.

O jogo é totalmente incrível, levando todas as qualidades de volta e melhorando (quase) todos os defeitos do 1ª jogo. A história, denovo, é muito bem construido, relembrando a saga de Chell e GLaDOS, trazendo novos personagens, como Wheatley, um Core (um robô com formato redondo), e Cave Johnson (criador da Aperture Science, empresa onde se passa o jogo inteiro). E a Valve trouxe mais novidades nessa sequência, incluindo o modo Co-Op, onde colocam mais 2 personagens, chamados 'Atlas' e 'P-Body', na história original de Portal. Eles também permitiram a criação de mapas e mod's no jogo.

Nota: 11/10

[h1]Плюсы +[/h1]
1) Хорошая оптимизация!
2)Неплохой сюжет!
3)Руская озвучка очень круто зделано, примерно 2 человека на однаво персонажа.
4)Геймплей на высоте!
5)Графика тоже не обошла стороной (круто)
[h1]Минусы -[/h1]
1)Почему нельзя сделать некоторые моменты лучше? Например больше раскрытие сюжета,Пролизания персонажа в дыры которые больше него! И меня удивила "говорящяя картошка"
Чего? Valve я знаю что ето игра. Но блин ето!
2)Пожалуйста больше персонажей!
3)И почему портал ставится только на определённую поверхность? Ето странно.
[h1]Об игре...[/h1]
[b]Ребята играть советую, отличная головоломка на соображения и умения думать! Моя оценка за всю игру 7/10 за бесплатную главу (DLC) ставлю 3/10[/b]
Мой совет: играйте!
